DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether contact sensitization occur skin normal healthy human subject , repetitive application IV Clear™ , Tegaderm CHG™ Silicone Vehicle Control dressing .
DOC.brief_title: Human Repeat Insult Patch Test Wound Dressings
DOC.detailed_description: A single center , within-subject randomize study design healthy adult subject . Qualified subject complete three phase study ( induction , rest challenge ) . Data irritation , adhesion pain upon removal collect individual patch site .
DOC.criteria: Male female , 18 year old In good health , determine medical history concomitant medication Able comprehend sign inform consent Unable bear child willing use adequate birth control Willing able follow study direction , participate study return specific visit Subject pregnant , plan pregnancy lactate Diabetes ( type ) Mastectomy involve removal lymph node Clinically significant skin disease , include limited psoriasis , eczema , atopic dermatitis , active cancer Asthma severe respiratory disease require medication Selfreported immunological disorder include ( limited ) HIV positive , AIDS , rheumatoid arthritis , systematic lupus erythematosus Treatment type cancer within last two year history skin cancer test area Use following : topically apply product ( e.g . medical , lotion , cream , etc . ) application site within 3 day first application test article , immunosuppressive drug within 30 day first application test article , systemic topical corticosteroid within 30 day first application test article , systemic topically applied antiinflammatory antihistamine medication within 3 day first application test article Participation patch test irritation sensitization within last four week Participation investigational drug study within last four week Damaged skin around test site include : sunburn , extremely deep tan , uneven skin tone , tattoo , scar , excessive hair , numerous freckle , disfiguration Known sensitization adhesive , bandage , material use test article Medical condition , investigator 's judgment , make subject ineligible place subject undue risk
